turns.content: Hey, bro Alex Chen wants to schedule a meeting with me around Jan 16th 3-4p
Hey! Would you like me to schedule a meeting with Alex Chen on January 16th from 3 PM to 4 PM? Please confirm!
I can check your availability for January 16th from 3 PM to 4 PM. Please hold on for a moment.

You're not available on January 16th from 3 PM to 4 PM due to a security audit scheduled from 2 PM to 4 PM and a 1:1 with Sarah from 3 PM to 3:30 PM. Would you like to suggest a different time for your meeting with Alex Chen?
